articles.title: WHO jab experts want more AstraZeneca clot data from outside Europe - Mint
articles.description: SAGE said most clotting cases were reported in Britain and the European Union, with very few cases noted in other countries.

articles.title: Barcelona say rejecting European Super League would have been 'historic error' - The42
